flawed_nl_solution:
In the second month he can run 6 miles because 3 x 2 = <<3*2=6>>6
In the third month he can run 12 miles because 6 x 2 = <<6*2=12>>12
In fourth month he can run 24 miles because 12 x 2 = <<12*2=24>>24
In fifth month he can run 84 miles because 24 x 2 = <<24*2=84>>84
He needs to start training 5 months ahead of time because 24 < 26.3 and 84>26.3.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 48, not 84. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
